description:
Total grid of height-depth data from the Western Scheldt to produce different ground maps.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Laser altimetry data combined with singlebeam sounding data where laser altimetry data has a higher priority than the sounding data. In order to fill the entire grid, it is then supplemented with multibeam soundings and additional data in Flemish territory.
keywords: 2012, bodemgrid, hoogte, diepte, Westerschelde, laseraltimetrie, singlebeam, grid, raaien, 2012, soil grid, height, depth, Western Scheldt, laser alimetry, single beam, grid, perpendicular lines to shore, Elevation
name: Topo-bathymetry (unit: m/reference plane: NAP, Western Scheldt, 2012)
